title: 820-00244  no SSD drive.
message:
That is a "perfect" short; luckly low enough to use voltage injection method.
Probably SSD controller (U8600), or a NAND chip; hopeless case...

title: 820-00244  no SSD drive.
message:
5A probably is the indication of your PSU.
If is limited at 5A, it doesn't inject anything.
You have a pure short, which requires more than 10A at 1V.

Buy 24V/20A PSU, or 12V/40A (adjustable, of course).
I already posted links on the forum and explained why!

title: 820-00244  no SSD drive.
message:
U8600  died     :-(    
motherboard to be used as spare parts
after removing this U8600 the short circuit resolved

Can you give me a link to those of the power supply you wrote about?
